summary: This is an internal FBI email from September 16, 2021, discussing Epstein discovery and coordination regarding a program manager from the FBI Victim Services Division. The email references a prior conversation about an individual who assisted at least one victim and notes the timing around Yom Kippur.

persons.name: Program Manager Victim Program Management Unit FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: The email is addressed to or references a program manager from the FBI Victim Services Division, whose contact details (desk, cell, email) are listed, indicating coordination on Epstein discovery and victim assistance.

events.title: Epstein discovery coordination email
events.description: An FBI email is sent discussing Epstein discovery and referencing a prior conversation about an individual who assisted at least one victim.
personsInvolved: Program Manager Victim Program Management Unit FBI Victim Services Division

keyFacts: The document is an FBI internal email dated September 16, 2021, concerning Epstein discovery.
It references a program manager from the FBI Victim Services Division, indicating ongoing victim-related coordination.
The email mentions a prior conversation about an individual who 'assisted at least one victim' of Epstein.
The correspondence occurs around Yom Kippur, as noted in the email text.
